## VaultKeeper.authorize() method

Decrypt a JWE, validate claims, verify executable identity, and return an opaque CapabilityToken.

**Signature:**

```typescript
authorize(jwe: string): Promise<{
        token: CapabilityToken;
        response: VaultResponse;
    }>;
```

jwe


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Compact JWE string from setup()


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ token: [CapabilityToken](./vaultkeeper.capabilitytoken.md)<!-- -->; response: [VaultResponse](./vaultkeeper.vaultresponse.md)<!-- -->; }&gt;

Opaque capability token for use with fetch/exec/getSecret
